hij123.title: World of Warcraft
hij123.description: This game is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) released in 2004 by Blizzard Entertainment.

abc123.text: I think this game is very fun. It has good game mechanics, and their cinematics are wonderful.
abc123.author: Mark Twan

def123.text: This game is not fun! It gets very repetitive and boring.
def123.author: Jane Austin

klm123.title: Dota 2
klm123.description: This game is a free-to-play multiplayer online battle arena gane (MOBA) developed and published by Valve Corporation.

pol123.text: This game is alright. I like that it's free to play but the mechanics of the game can get complex.
pol123.author: John Smith

qwe123.name: John Smith
qwe123.bio: My name is John. I like to play games.

rty123.name: Mark Twan
rty123.bio: My name is Mark. I'm from NC.
